entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 25 except 19 near the lake.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 25 except 19 near the lake. Humidex 27. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
